Sentencas: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O-3 was investigated in this study and it was found that the oxide ion conductivity increased significantly by doping Fe into Ga site.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Although the electrical conductivity monotonically increased with increasing amount of Fe, partial electronic conduction became significant.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, doping Mg for Ga site simultaneously with Fe is useful for keeping high transport number.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By doping Fe for Ga site, perovskite oxide with cubic structure seems to be stabilized and the solid solution limit for Sr for La site is expanded.
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Considering the transport number of oxide ion and the electronic conductivity, the optimum composition for oxide ion conductivity in this system is La0.7Sr0.3Ga0.7Fe0.2Mg0.1O3-delta (LSGFM73721).
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By using this oxide for electrolyte, large power density of 200 mW/cm(2) can be achieved at 873 K. (c) 2005
Titulo: Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells
Oxide ion conductivity in La(Sr)Ga(Fe,Mg)O3 and its application for solid oxide fuel cells
